description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores concepts like digital fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovation practices. yeehaa's blog posts delve into topics such as the evolution of ecosystems, internet fragmentation, and McLuhan's global village concept. His curated courses cover ecosystem grooming, preserving web diversity, practicing innovation, and valuing differences. yeehaa's approach combines strategic thinking with practical action, emphasizing creativity, diversity, and open knowledge exchange.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and foster inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores digital fragmentation, innovation, and knowledge sharing, emphasizing creativity and diversity.
